tuv.seg: Connecting to the internet
Ceangal leis an idirlíon ón mbaile
There are many different options for accessing the internet from your home
Tá go leor roghanna éagsúla ann chun an t-idirlíon a rochtain
Common methods of Internet access by users include:
I measc na modhanna coiteanna chun rochtain a fháil ar an Idirlíon, tá an méid a leanas:
• Dial-up with a computer modem via a telephone line
• diailiú le móideim ríomhaire trí líne ghutháin nó
• Broadband over designated cables
• leathanbhanda thar cháblaí sainithe nó
• Wireless connections using Wi-Fi, satellite and mobile phone technology
• naisc gan sreang trí theicneolaíocht Wi-Fi, satailíte agus ghuthán póca a úsáid
The option you choose can depend on cost, connection speed, quality of connection and whether a service is available in your area
Féadfaidh an rogha a roghnaíonn tú brath ar chostas, luas an naisc, cáilíocht an naisc agus ar cibé acu an bhfuil nó nach bhfuil seirbhís ar fáil i do cheantar
The Commission for Communications Regulation (ComReg) provides information on internet services on Comreg's website
Soláthraíonn an Coimisiún um Rialáil Cumarsáide (ComReg) freagraí ar Cheisteanna Coitianta (CCanna) faoi sheirbhísí idirlín
Internet service providers are regulated by Commission for Communications Regulation (ComReg)
Tá soláthraithe seirbhíse idirlín rialaithe ag ComReg
You can find a internet service providers authorised to operate in Ireland on ComRegs website
Féadfaidh tú teacht ar liosta de sholáthraithe seirbhíse idirlín atá údaraithe le hoibriú in Éirinn ar láithreán gréasáin ComReg
Some internet service providers can also provide phone and television services
Féadfaidh roinnt soláthraithe seirbhíse idirlín seirbhísí gutháin agus teilifíse a sholáthar chomh maith
You can subscribe to a different service provider for internet and telephone purposes if you wish
Féadfaidh tú suibscríobh le soláthraí seirbhíse éagsúil do chuspóirí idirlín agus teilifíse, más mian leat
Shop around for the best package that meets your needs
Ba cheart duit súil a chaitheamh thart chun an pacáiste is fearr a aimsiú a fhreastalaíonn ar do riachtanais
ComReg’s independent price guide will allow you to compare the costs of home phone, broadband, mobile phone and combined packages for your specific usage needs

Cuirfidh treoir praghais neamhspleách ComReg ag www.callcosts.ie ar do chumas costais phacáistí guthán baile, leathanbhanda agus guthán póca agus chomhphacáistí a chur i gcomparáid lena chéile do do riachtanais shonracha úsáide
Broadband is a term for high speed internet access
Úsáidtear an téarma Banda Leathan i dtaobh deis ardluais ar an idirlíon
Broadband allows users to access bigger amounts of data such as large video files
Cuireann leathanbhanda ar chumas úsáideoirí chun rochtain a fháil ar mhéideanna níos mó sonraí, ar nós comhaid mhóra
The benefit of broadband is its speed and that it is always on
Is é an tairbhe a bhaineann le leathanbhanda ná a luas agus go mbíonn sé ar siúl i gcónaí
There are a number of broadband technologies that enable you to access the internet quickly
Tá roinnt teicneolaíochtaí leathanbhanda ann a chuireann ar do chumas rochtain a fháil ar an idirlíon go tapa
Digital subscriber line (DSL), fibre-optic, cable, mobile and satellite are all technologies that provide high speed access to the internet
Teicneolaíochtaí iad líne dhigiteach rannpháirtí (DSL), cábla snáthoptaice, soghluaiste agus satailít go léir a sholáthraíonn rochtain ardluais ar an idirlíon
There are many different providers of Broadband and each will have a different package for the provision of services
Is iomaí soláthraí éagsúil Leathanbhanda atá ann agus beidh pacáiste éagsúil ag gach ceann díobh chun seirbhísí a sholáthar
Most offer a flat rate which means that you will be charged the same for provision of services every month. There may be a limit on the amount you can download
Cuireann an chuid is mó díobh bunráta ar fáil a chiallaíonn go ngearrfar an táille chéanna ort ar sheirbhísí a sholáthar gach mí
Make sure that you are happy with these limits when you subscribe to the service
Bí cinnte go bhfuil tú sásta leis na teorainneacha sula nglacann tú síntiús leis an tseirbhís
Broadband speed is measured in Mb (megabits) per second
Déantar luas leathanbhanda a thomhas de réir Mbanna (meigighiotáin sa soicind)
Download refers to the speed with which you can receive content from the Internet
Tagraíonn íoslódáil don luas is féidir leat ábhar a fháil ón Idirlíon
Upload refers to the speed with which you can send content
Tagraíonn uaslódáil don luas is féidir leat ábhar a sheoladh
Most people download much more than they upload, therefore Broadband download speeds are always set to be faster than upload speeds
Déanann formhór na ndaoine i bhfad níos mó a íoslódáil ná mar a dhéanann siad a uaslódáil, ar an ábhar sin, bíonn luasanna íoslódála Leathanbhanda i gcónaí níos tapúla ná luasanna uaslódála
More information on Broadband internet access and Broadband providers is available from ComReg
Féadfaidh tú teacht ar bhreis faisnéise ar rochtain idirlín Leathanbhanda agus ar sholáthraithe Leathanbhanda
June 2015, the government announced the National Broadband Plan
I Meitheamh 2015, d’fhógair an rialtas an Plean Náisiúnta Leathanbhanda

This is a State intervention to make broadband available nationally because commercial operators have made it clear that there are large parts of the country that they cannot make high speed broadband services available commercially

Idirghabháil Stáit é seo chun leathanbhanda a chur ar fáil go náisiúnta mar gheall gur shoiléirigh oibreoirí tráchtála gurb ann do chodanna móra den tír nach féidir leo seirbhísí leathanbhanda ardluais a chur ar fáil dóibh ar bhonn tráchtála
While the internet can be a source of knowledge and entertainment for children, there also can be dangers for children
Cé gur féidir an t-idirlíon a bheith ina foinse eolais agus siamsaíocht do leanaí, is féidir a bheith ann freisin contúirtí do leanaí
The Office for Internet Safety (OIS) was established in March 2008 within the Department of Justice and Equality to promote internet safety
Bunaíodh an Oifig um Shábháilteacht Idirlín (OSI) Márta 2008 laistigh den Roinn Dlí agus Cirt agus Comhionannais a chur chun cinn sábháilteachta idirlín
Information and advice on internet safety is available on its website internetsafety.ie
Tá eolas agus comhairle faoi shábháilteacht ar an idirlíon ar fáil ar a láithreán gréasáin internetsafety.ie
Information on the safe use of the internet is available at makeitsecure.org
Tá eolas ar úsáid shábháilte an idirlín ar fáil ag makeitsecure.org

A service called hotline.ie, which is run by the Internet Service Providers Association of Ireland (ISPAI), was setup to provide an anonymous reporting service for members of the public who want to report suspected illegal content which they have encountered on the Internet

Bhí seirbhís ar a dtugtar hotline.ie, atá á reáchtáil ag an Idirlíon Seirbhís Soláthraithe Cumann na hÉireann (ISPAI), thus chun seirbhís tuairiscithe gan ainm do bhaill den phobal ar mian leo a thuairisciú ábhar neamhdhleathach amhras a bhíonn siad ar an Idirlíon
Hotline.ie's primary aim is to combat child pornography, however, other forms of illegal content and activities on the Internet may be reported using this service
Sa chás go mbíonn tú míshásta le gné ar bith den tseirbhís idirlín atá agat ba cheart duit, ar an gcéad dul síos, é sin a chur in iúl don soláthraí seirbhíse
Their website also provides safety advice for parents and children on using the internet
Is féidir tuilleadh a léamh anseo maidir le gearán a dhéanamh le ComReg
Consumer contracts are protected by the Sale of Goods and Supply of Services Act, 1980
Tá conarthaí tomhaltóra cosanta faoin Acht um Dhíol Earraí agus Soláthar Seirbhísí, 1980
If you have a contract with a service supplier you can expect that:
Sa chás go bhfuil conradh agat le soláthraí seirbhíse, is féidir a bheith ag súil
• The supplier has the necessary skill to provide the service
• go bhfuil an scil is gá ag an soláthraí chun an tseirbhís a chur ar fáil
• The service will be provided with proper care and diligence
• go gcuirfear an tseirbhís ar fáil leis an gcúram agus an dúthracht is dual
• The materials used will be sound and that goods supplied with the service will be of merchantable quality
• go mbeidh an t-ábhar a úsáidtear slán agus go mbeidh na hearraí a sholáthraítear leis an tseirbhís ar chaighdeán indíolta
You can read more about your rights when you buy a service
Is féidir tuilleadh a léamh maidir le do chuid cearta nuair a cheannaíonn tú seirbhís anseo

This document tells you how to complain. If you have exhausted the customer complaints mechanism of the service provider and are still dissatisfied you can contact ComReg who may, depending on the complaint, be able to help you. You can read more about making complaints about your service provider

Má bhain tú triail cheana as meicníocht ghearáin chustaiméara an tsoláthraí seirbhíse agus mura bhfuil tú sásta go fóill, féadfaidh tú teagmháil a dhéanamh le ComReg, ar féidir leis, ag brath ar an ngearán, cabhair a thabhairt duit
A comparison of the costs of Broadband plans from the various providers is available from ComReg
Tá rátaí do línte dialaithe agus don Bhanda Leathan ar fáil ón na hISPanna féin
Contact your chosen internet service provider and they will explain what you need to do to get connected to the internet from your home
Déan teagmháil leis an soláthraí seirbhíse idirlín a roghnaigh tú agus míneoidh siad duit cad is gá duit a dhéanamh go nascfar leis an idirlíon thú ó do theach
